Class CreateLobbyController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.view.viewModel.ModelObserver
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.view.gui.guiControllers.CreateLobbyController
public class CreateLobbyController extends ModelObserver
The controller for the Create Lobby view Uses ModelObserver to be updated with the ViewModelState
